snippet.title: The Path Into The Abyss - Official Spanish Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
The Path Into The Abyss is a hardcore first-person open-world survival shooter set in Buenos Aires with a backdrop of cosmic horror, combat mechanics, dynamic AI, and looting. The Path Into The Abyss is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
